Package edu.frontrange.csc240.a8

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    The Controller is used to interpret actions taken by the user on the View.
    Model
    This class acts as the “model” for the computation of the temperatures, in the MVC (model-view-controller) design pattern used here to create this application.
    Scale
    This class is a simple converter for temperature scales, where the scales are defined as class values.
    TemperatureConversion
    Main application.
    View
    The View will pass input data to the Controller which will decide whether that data represents new information, and will take display information from the Model.
    ViewSelectionPanel
    The ViewSelectionPanel has three components: a label at the top left, a panel containing the selection method for the scale, one for each temperature system, and a text field, for inputting or displaying the numeric value of the temperature.
